name: Bionicle Smackdown
description:
This is our janky bionicle game! It is a multiplayer based PVP game, fight and kill your opponent to win! Players are randomly assigned to either Zaktan, or Jaller, toa of fire! 

NOTE: Lego does not endorse any part of this game whatsoever and no profits are being earned from this game. This is a completely free to play game, developed out of pure love for the Bionicle franchise. 

Enjoy!

Controls: 

A - Move left 

D - Move right 

W - Climb (when on wall) 

E - Ultimate ability (when purple meter is full) 

Spacebar - Jump (or double jump if pressed twice)

 J - Melee attack 

K - Block 

L - Shoot zamor sphere 

Special controls for Zaktan: 

Q - Laser eye attack (when purple meter is full) 

W - Float up (when ultimate attack is active) 

S - Float down (when ultimate attack is active)
